title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: I saw this interesting Livespins game on Livecasino.io while browsing on the slot game browser. I became interested because you watch and bet with your favorite streamer in real-time. You can get the multiplier that he gets once you made a bet on him. I always love watching streamers playing and now this feature makes my dream country to ride on the game of my favorite streamer.I don't know if this feature is available in other casinos because I just recently discovered it when I'm browsing the perfect slot that I will use on the multiplier event of livecasino. Posting it here in gambling board as awareness of the existence of this type of game. Is this game new or it's already available on other platforms a long time ago?This is how the game looks like:

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: How can you find out that the history of Livespins begins at the end of 2021 when the product was introduced by Robin Reed, CEO of Happy Hour.io but it's hard to say how much support he has received among online casinos, which is interesting because there are bets against the streamer that is currently playing.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I am not familiar with livecasino's slot games and also the game you mentioned is kind of the same as Sugar BangBang in some casino in my country. I don't know if the multiplier of that game is the same as the game I mentioned where you spin and if there's a combo then the multiplier increases each combo where the max combo in the game I mentioned is X5 for normal spins and when during free spins (scatter) then the multiplier is up to X10. I luckily got up to X10 many times.

comments.author: klidex

Posting it here in gambling board as awareness of the existence of this type of game. Is this game new or it's already available on other platforms a long time ago?Do you believe in Steaming which is carried out by affiliates who are playing a game and managed to get the jackpot.If you believe and want to follow him to play in the hope of getting a jackpot, then you will only lose money and it is unlikely that you will be able to get the jackpot as expected.It would be better if you play in a game that you really understand and believe in to be able to give you luck or victory.Don't let you experience defeat and lose a lot of money just for joining in without having a mature strategy for playing it.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on January 21, 2023, 08:43:51 AMHow can you find out that the history of Livespins begins at the end of 2021 when the product was introduced by Robin Reed, CEO of Happy Hour.io but it's hard to say how much support he has received among online casinos, which is interesting because there are bets against the streamer that is currently playing.Thanks for the info. I'm not a fan of slots and just browse them whenever there's a contest involving slots but I never play slots too often compared to Blackjack. I'm surprised that this idea is available for long time while some other streamer manage to do funds accumulating to their supporter just to ride on the streamer game.Quote from: klidex on January 21, 2023, 09:21:39 AMDo you believe in Steaming which is carried out by affiliates who are playing a game and managed to get the jackpot.If you believe and want to follow him to play in the hope of getting a jackpot, then you will only lose money and it is unlikely that you will be able to get the jackpot as expected.It would be better if you play in a game that you really understand and believe in to be able to give you luck or victory.Don't let you experience defeat and lose a lot of money just for joining in without having a mature strategy for playing it.I know exactly the risk of gambling and playing slots because I'm a gambler for a long time. What I'm trying to emphasize in my statement is the experience of playing with your favorite streamers and joining on his bets. For me it's more entertaining to play with the one that you idolized rather than play for yourself and watch the slot spin multiple times, it's boring especially if you are not winning. Also, there's a schedule for the streamers including there game. You can still choose what slot game you can ride.Lastly. Having someone who loss on the same bet can ease the pain of losing rather than solo.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: I currently like to bet on Slots, but rarely bet on Livecasino.there is a little question, are these Livespins available every day or only on certain days?As in other gambling, there is also live streaming betting, but only on certain days.but, after seeing your post I became interested to try and see how it works. wish me luck there

comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on January 21, 2023, 11:44:12 AMQuote from: Daltonik on January 21, 2023, 08:43:51 AMHow can you find out that the history of Livespins begins at the end of 2021 when the product was introduced by Robin Reed, CEO of Happy Hour.io but it's hard to say how much support he has received among online casinos, which is interesting because there are bets against the streamer that is currently playing.Thanks for the info. I'm not a fan of slots and just browse them whenever there's a contest involving slots but I never play slots too often compared to Blackjack. I'm surprised that this idea is available for long time while some other streamer manage to do funds accumulating to their supporter just to ride on the streamer game.That's also quite surprising in my part even though I do play a couple of slot games but I never knew this thing yet and I never saw it was being discussed here even on the slots thread. I find the feature cool and it makes me want to bet here than playing the actual game myself, especially if that streamer is my idol.It elevates the fun that we are going to have. If your goal is to play for profit and you are hoping for the streamer to get the jackpot then you also need to make sure that your capital is big because you will likely ran out of funds just before the streamer gets it since their funds are much bigger than their viewers. More if the game was sponsored by the casino.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Op I don't think this is a regular game, from the way you described it, that is just to watch and plays your bet. That is nice, that is you can at least 95% accurate in the bet with game. The feature might be in other casinos but they might be different in nature and spins. Every casino can't carry the same casino features because it will not attract gamblers but if they are of different nature and class, everyone will like to try the differences. Though I have not seen such. Thank your for the search and bringing new discovery even though others have likeness feature.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: I don't know which casino with a live slot game feature but if I'm not mistaken, I think I've seen live slot games on Youtube and not in a casino. The gambler uses YouTube to stream his games so his followers can follow him live. And sometimes, if the Youtuber or gambler wins, they immediately distribute bonuses to people who have joined them. That's one way of promotion that gamblers can do. By playing live, they can get followers and referrals by clicking on the link in the description.

Many viewer said that streamer is using slot when streaming that’s why they are always winning huge amount but this time they can bet with the streamer to experience same luck.
